title: Box Sofa
artistDisplayName:
Attributed to Duncan Phyfe (American, born Scotland, 1768–1854)
New York
medium: Rosewood and gilded wood, with ormolu mounts, die-stamped brass inlay inset with rosewood, brass stringing, gilt-brass castors, and upholstery
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by the Antiquarian Society and Mrs. Herbert A. Vance
